Heading: Description
Text: Glittering gold dust wrapped in a handkerchief

Heading: Description
Text: A rather dapper top hat. Whatever size you are, the hat is just slightly too big.

Heading: Description
Text: This is a map of an island with an X on the tallest cliff on the East side.

Heading: Rum
Text: The 'X' is a fake. When you hold it up to a bright light, you see the translucent mark of the real X, on the side of the Gloomy Pond on the Northwest of the island.

Heading: Description
Text: A flag with a skull and crossbones on it

Heading: Rum
Text: The key to this chest is kept in Captain Hook's cabinet

Heading: Rum
Text: This is a bottle of poison!
